summary: This bill, the Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act, aims to redesignate the Salem Maritime National Historic Site as the Salem Maritime National Historical Park. It also mandates the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the feasibility of expanding the park's boundaries to include sites related to maritime history, coastal defenses, and military history within the Salem, Massachusetts area. The Secretary is required to submit a report on the study's findings within three years.
